main event: An unidentified flying object was reported hovering over Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, on August 22, 1964.
interesting points: The object was first seen moving slowly from east to south before hovering over the base., It emitted a bluish-white light and moved at high speed to the west out of sight., The sighting lasted about one minute and was visually confirmed by a radar station., Additionally, there was a previous report of a bright object traveling north that gained altitude and disappeared after irregular blips were detected., The document states that this does not appear to be a normal aerial vehicle currently known.
witness description: The report does not specify any witnesses, but indicates radar confirmation.
